issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Kitchen Sink does not have ti.map module included in tiapp.xml.
h5. Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink> BaseUI> Views> MapView
2. Observe the screen. Workaround is to add ti.map manually.
h5. Actual result
No map
fields.summary: KitchenSink: none of the platforms has module ti.map
fields.environment:
Node.JS Version: v0.10.13
NPM Version: 1.3.2
├── acs@1.0.14
├── alloy@1.3.1
├── npm@1.3.2
├── titanium@3.2.1
└── titanium-code-processor@1.1.0
npm -g ls titanium: /usr/local/lib
KS <guid>75c46c6a-35a6-4fad-bf29-3b3f28341c78</guid> from Studio Samples
KS <guid>28a706e9-4130-4acb-bc76-9494255a9279</guid> from github

comments.body: Still an issue as of today with TiSDK master (6.1.0).
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
